servinfo.title: 2nd Timing Chain (Bank 1) and Timing Chain Tensioner Adjuster No.1 Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: 2nd Timing Chain (Bank 1) and Timing Chain Tensioner Adjuster No.1 Removal and Installation:N32A

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain Guide No.1
servinfosub.ptxt: Check shoe (1) for wear or damage.

servinfosub.title: Timing Chain Tensioner No.1
servinfosub.ptxt: Check shoe (1) and contact surface of plunger (2) for wear or damage.

servinfosub.title: 2nd Timing Chain (Bank 1)
servinfosub.ptxt: Check timing chain for wear or damage.

item.ptxt: Check timing chain tensioner adjuster No.1 and contact surface (1) of timing chain tensioner No.1 for wear or damage.
If any malfunction is found, replace adjuster No.1.
If any malfunction is found, replace plunger (2).
